description: Glued-on softcover; white Vicksburg Vellum text paper; title printed in black ink on front and spine; glassine dust jacket; yellow cardboard slipcases accompanied several books in the first edition; 48 pp. This copy: Second edition (1970).
medium: Artist's book; offset printing, with yellow varnish tint overprint
title: Various Small Fires and Milk
